sentences.en: Boundary friction is independent of the guide material used.
sentences.cn: 边界摩擦与导纱杆材料质地无关.

sentences.en: Check your rope frequently, as friction against the rock can wear it away.
sentences.cn: 要经常检查绳索，因为与岩石摩擦会使它磨损。

sentences.en: Constant friction wore out the heels of my shoes.
sentences.cn: 不断的摩擦磨损了我的鞋跟.

sentences.en: Friction acts on moving bodies and brings them to a stop.
sentences.cn: 摩擦力作用于运动着的物体,并使其停止.

sentences.en: Friction lowers the efficiency of a machine.
In designing a machine it is necessary to reduce friction as much as possible.
sentences.cn: 在设计一种机器时,必须尽可能减低摩擦.

sentences.en: In most machines friction consumes effort, with the result that less work is got out than is put in.
sentences.cn: 在大多数机器中,摩擦要消耗功, 以致造成输出的功要小于输入的功.

sentences.en: It did not furnish an explantation for the heat generated by friction.
sentences.cn: 它未能圆满地解释因摩擦而产生的热.

sentences.en: Oil is put in machinery to reduce the friction.
sentences.cn: 把油涂到机器上减少摩擦.

sentences.en: Putting oil on both surfaces reduces friction.
sentences.cn: 两面都上油可减小摩擦力。

sentences.en: Sara sensed that there had been friction between her children.
sentences.cn: 萨拉感觉到她的孩子之间有过争执。

sentences.en: The microcracks can be caused by friction, mechanical treatment, thermoelastic forces, etc.
sentences.cn: 微裂纹可能是因摩擦 、 机械作用 、 热弹性力等等原因所造成.

sentences.en: The pistons are graphite-coated to reduce friction.
sentences.cn: 活塞上涂了一层石墨以减小摩擦力。

sentences.en: the usual frictions between parents and their teenage children
sentences.cn: 家长和十几岁的孩子之间常见的摩擦

sentences.en: the usual frictions between parents and their teenage children.
sentences.cn: 家长和十几岁的孩子之间常见的摩擦

sentences.en: This is not the case when friction is present.
sentences.cn: 有摩擦时,情况就不是这样了.

sentences.en: When Joan returned to work, the friction between them increased.
sentences.cn: 琼回来工作后, 他们之间的摩擦加剧了.

words.tran_cn: 摩擦音的；由摩擦产生的
[力] 摩擦的；由摩擦而生的

phrases.tran_cn: 摩擦力矩；摩擦转矩；摩擦扭矩
表面摩擦（表皮摩擦机壳与空气的摩擦力）
静摩擦；干摩擦；库仑摩擦

trans.tran_en: disagreement, angry feelings, or unfriendliness between people
